data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Ghazipur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ghazipur, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Ghazipur that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Ghazipur, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Ghazipur, Uttar Pradesh, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jat Dhariwal (Muslim traditions) people might believe through him.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Ghazipur, Uttar Pradesh, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Ghazipur, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 39,823 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Ghazipur
location.people_groups_list: Jat Deswal, Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions), Brahmin Sawaria, Faqir, Jat Dhankar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jat Deswal (74,000), Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions) (273,000), Brahmin Sawaria (4,277,000), Faqir (90,000), Jat Dhankar (48,000)
